programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Joel, the owner of an Extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: Blackjack
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren plays Jack Devlin, a U.S Marshal who protects high-profile clients when it comes to a matter of security.

programme.title: Get the Girl
programme.desc: Calvin Jones works at a boring and whimsical office job while searching for meaning to his life and decides that means winning the affections of the office hottie Britney. Calvin struggles mightily to capture the true words to express his feelings, but can not.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Young Jim Hawkins and Peg-legged Long John Silver set sail for adventure in Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of dastardly pirates, swashbuckling heroes, buried treasure, and a young boys courage during the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: An epic fantasy adventure from director Chen Kaige (Farewell My Concubine). Nominated for a golden globe for best foreign language film.

programme.title: Algotnis
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Džeimsu Hārperu pēkšņi atvaļina no dienesta ASV Jūras kājnieku korpusā, nepiešķirot izdienas pensiju, viņš pievienojas privātai paramilitārai organizācijai, lai gādātu par savu ģimeni vienīgajā veidā, kādā viņš to prot.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: 10 gadus pavadot cietumā, Braucējam ir bijis tikai viens mērķis - atriebt sava brāļa nāvi. Tagad viņš ir brīvībā un gatavs ķerties pie savas nāvējošās misijas, tomēr viņa ceļā stājas divi vīri - izbijis policists un jauns, egocentrisks slepkava.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Lietains kajaka izbrauciens upē.

programme.desc: Uz līkumotā Malholanda ceļa Losandželosā naktī notikusi avārija. Bet, attopoties notikuma vietā, jauna sieviete neatceras neko, pat ne to, kas ir viņa pati. Viss šķiet mulsinošs kā sirreālā sapnī. Tāds apjukums, tik daudz neatbildētu jautājumu!

programme.desc: Sekojot četriem draugiem, kuri ceļo pa Ķīnu, meklējot vienu no savām bioloģiskajām mātēm. Visi satuvinās un atklāj patiesību par to, ko nozīmē zināt un mīlēt sevi.

programme.title: Vieglas uzvedības teicamniece
programme.desc: Kad Olīva samelo savai labākajai draudzenei par nevainības zaudēšanu ar vienu no koledžas puišiem, to nejauši dzird kāda cita meitene. Drīz vien šis stāsts izplatās pa visu skolu, gluži kā kūlas ugunsgrēks.

programme.title: Ja es palikšu
programme.desc: Jaunās Mias Holas dzīve izmainās acumirklī - pēc autoavārijas viņa nonāk komā. Ārpusķermeņa pieredzes laikā viņai jāizlemj vai pamosties un dzīvot dzīvi, kas ir daudz savādāka, nekā viņa bija iedomājusies. Izvēle ir viņas ziņā.

programme.title: Hērakls
programme.desc: Izturējis savus leģendāros divpadsmit darbus, grieķu padieva Herkulesa dzīve kā zobens tiek pārbaudīta, kad Trāķijas karalis un viņa meita meklē viņa palīdzību, lai sakautu tirānisku karavadoni.

programme.title: Slevina laimīgais skaitlis
programme.desc: Miermīlīgo puisi Slevinu netīšām sajauc ar kādu citu. Pašam negribot, viņš iesaistās karā starp diviem bandītu grupējumiem, kurus vada visslavenākās kriminālas autoritātes pilsētā - Rabijs un Boss. Tagad Slevinam seko līdzi gan neatlaidīgais detektīvs Brikovskis, gan neģēlīgais slepkava Gudkets. Ka izķepuroties no šādas situācijas?

programme.title: Par manu tēvu
programme.desc: Kad Sebastjana tēvs Salvo, vecmodīgs itāļu imigrants, uzzina, ka dēls grasās bildināt savu no papēžiem līdz matu galiņiem amerikānisko draudzeni, Salvo uzstāj, ka vēlas pavadīt neaizmirstamu nedēļas nogali ar viņas smalkajiem un bagātajiem vecākiem.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa
programme.desc: Sāra un Viktors ir kopā vairāk nekā 45 gadus. Kā viņi to izdarīja? Kas īsti ir Sāra, šī mīklainā sieviete, kura vienmēr ir bijusi sava vīra ēnā? Mīlestība, ambīcijas un noslēpumi veicina šī neparastā pāra odiseju.

programme.title: Neredzamais viesis
programme.desc: Jauns uzņēmējs pamostas no iekšpuses aizslēgtā viesnīcas numurā, blakus esot mīļotās līķim. Viņš nolīgst prestižu juristu, un vienas nakts laikā, intensīvi strādājot, noskaidro, kas noticis šajā trakotajā periodā.

programme.title: Rozā sapņos
programme.desc: Stāsts par mīlestību fantāzijas pilnā pasaulē, kur mīļotie uz satikšanos lido rozā mākoņos un dejo grieztos, kur parastā dzīvoklī dzīvo saule un peles sarunājas ar kaķiem, kur ziedi aug cilvēkos un sirds siltums spēj iznīcināt visnāvējošākos ieročus.

programme.title: Gogēns. Ceļojums uz Taiti
programme.desc: Parīze, 1891. gads. Franču mākslinieks Pols Gogēns Parīzē jūtas nospiests un radoši iztukšojies. Viss apkārt šķiet samākslots. Ir jādodas uz Polinēziju pretī eksotiskam skaistumam! Diemžēl tā nedomā Gogēna sieva un viņa pieci bērni, kuri atsakās sekot līdzi Gogēnam uz "zudušo paradīzi".

programme.title: Makaluso māsas
programme.desc: Marija, Pinuccia, Lia, Katia un Antonella ir piecas māsas, kuras dzīvo dzīvoklī Palermo. Kad Antonella pēkšņi nomirst, māsu attiecības tiek apgrieztas kājām gaisā uz visu atlikušo mūžu.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.title: Stokholma
programme.desc: Kriminālkomēdijā "Stokholma" atainota bēdīgi slavenā ķīlnieku krīze 1973. gadā, kad laupītāji vairākas dienas turēja gūstā Stokholmas centrālās bankas darbiniekus. Tieši pēc šī gadījuma arī radās termins "Stokholmas sindroms", kas apzīmē situāciju, kad ķīlnieks izjūt simpātijas pret sagūstītāju un sāk to aizstāvēt.

programme.title: Bolero
programme.desc: 1928. gadā horeogrāfe Ida Rubinšteina Parīzē pasūtīja Morisam Ravēlam mūziku savam nākamajam baletam. Esot iedvesmas krīzē, komponists izvērtē savu dzīvi un nolemj veltīties universāla šedevra - "Bolero" - radīšanai.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 2. Cooking show.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Masters
programme.desc: Americas most in demand cake designer, Duff Goldman, has a long list of A-list Hollywood stars all desperate for the cake of their dreams. This reality TV series follows Goldmans new Los Angeles bakery and the cakes that it creates for its rich and famous clientele. Whether he is making a cake with a panorama of Los Angeles for a million-dollar gala or making a playable guitar cake, Duff Goldman and his crew aim to make edible works of art unlike anything that has been seen before. The Hollywood elite love these cakes and their demands range from hilarious to scary but it does not scare the bakers, if anything it spurs them on.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Mango, Pineapple And Pork. Oh My!. Michael Symon heats up the grill for a savoury pork tenderloin marinated in brown sugar, a fruity mango slaw and a thirst-quenching cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Moms All-American Mac. Michael Symon recreates the Greek-American dishes of his childhood, including his mothers pasta, a crispy salad and a mashup of two desserts.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Biškopis
programme.desc: Viena cilvēka nežēlīga, atriebības vadīta cīņa iegūst valstiskus apmērus, kad atklājas, ka viņš bijis aģents ietekmīgā un slepenā organizācijā, kas pazīstama ar nosaukumu "Biškopji".

programme.title: Ir laiks
programme.desc: Kad Timam aprit 21 gads, tēvs atklāj puisim neticamu ģimenes noslēpumu: visi viņu dzimtas vīrieši spēj atgriezties pagātnē. Tims var atgriezties jebkurā savas dzīves brīdī, lai panāktu, ka viss notiek nevainojami. Puisis izlemj izmantot šīs īpašās spējas, lai iekarotu daiļās Mērijas sirdi, taču izrādās, ka īsta mīlestība var būt līdz smieklīgumam neparedzama pat tad, ja ir iespēja visu neskaitāmas reizes atkārtot no jauna.

programme.title: Killers. Pēdējā misija
programme.desc: Algots slepkava ir atšvešinājies no dēla un sirgst ar demenci, kas strauji attīstās. Viņam tiek piedāvāta iespēja izpirkt savus grēkus, glābjot dēla dzīvību.

programme.title: Nedžentlmeniskas karadarbības ministrija
programme.desc: Neticams un noklusēts patiess stāsts par pašu pirmo īpašo spēku organizāciju, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā dibināja Vinstons Čērčils un neliela militāro ierēdņu grupa. Slepenā kaujas vienība, ko veidoja raibum raiba neliešu un disidentu kompānija, devās riskantā misijā pret nacistiem, izmantojot neierastas un pilnībā "nedžentlmeniskas" cīņas tehnikas. Viņu bezbailīgā pieeja mainīja kara gaitu un ielika pamatus mūsdienu slepeno operāciju karadarbībai.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši pieci gadi, kopš Hiks un Nezobs veiksmīgi apvienoja pūķus un vikingus uz Berkas salas. Kamēr Astrīda, Snūģis un pārējie sacenšas pūķu sacīkstēs (kas ir salas iemītnieku mīļākais sporta veids), nešķiramie draugi iepazīst apkārtni, veidojot līdz šim neatklāto teritoriju karti un atklājot jaunas pasaules. Kārtējā piedzīvojuma laikā viņi atklāj slepenu ledus alu, kur mīt vairāki simti savvaļas pūķu un noslēpumainais Pūķu Jātnieks. Hiku un Nezobu ierauj kaujā par miera saglabāšanu pasaulē. Tagad viņiem jācīnās par to, kam viņi tic, un tikai kopīgiem spēkiem draugi spēs mainīt cilvēku un pūķu nākotni.

programme.title: Dzīves garšas
programme.desc: Eiženija ir meistarīga pavāre, kura jau vairāk nekā 20 gadus strādā pie izsmalcināta gardēža Dodēna. Laika gaitā viņu sadarbība pāraugusi romantiskās attiecībās, kas iedvesmo gardus ēdienus, par kuriem sajūsminās pat pasaules izcilākie šefpavāri. Tomēr, neraugoties uz Dodēna uzstājību, Eiženija nesteidzas teikt viņam jāvārdu. Lai mīļoto pārliecinātu, Dodēns nolemj sākt gatavot maltītes viņai.

programme.title: Pusotrs spiegs
programme.desc: Kelvins Džoiners (Kevins Hārts) skolas laikā bija populārais puisis. Divdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš ir veiksmīgs grāmatvedis, kuru pārsteidz ziņa no Boba Stouna. Izrādās, ka patiesībā viņš ir Robijs Vīrdikts (Dveins Džonsons) – apsmietais tīnis viņa skolā. Bobs ir trenējies divdesmit gadus un šobrīd ir izcils CIP aģents. Viņš algo Kelvinu, lai ar viņa grāmatvedības prasmju palīdzību izsekotu ierīci, kura ASV spiegošanas jomā var radīt jucekli. Dīvainais pāris sastopas ar pārspēku, taču viņiem sanāk arī daži varoņdarbi.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.
Ir 1917. gada 6. aprīlis. Bruņoto spēku vadība nolemj pretinieka aizmugurē nosūtīt divus kareivjus, kuri, ja izdotos nogādāt ziņu, glābs 1600 vīru no drošas nāves ienaidnieka slazdos.

programme.title: Lūsija
programme.desc: Seksapīlā blondīne Lūsija kļūst par bīstamāko un nāvējošāko sievieti uz pasaules, apveltītu ar nepārspējamu intelektu un pārcilvēciskām fiziskām spējām. No potenciāla upura viņa ir pārvērtusies par mednieci un dodas pa pēdām tiem, kuri viņu gribēja nogalināt.

programme.title: Īsāk sakot
programme.desc: Tedijam patīk stiept visu garumā, taču pēc kādas savādas tikšanās ar svešinieci viņš pamostas rītā pēc savām kāzām un atklāj, ka jau pienākusi kāzu pirmā gadadiena. Tedija sieva ir stāvoklī, un viņš – pavadījis laulībā gadu, no kura neatceras ne mirkli. Ik pēc pāris minūtēm Tedijs attopas gadu vēlāk un cīnās pret straujajiem laika lēcieniem, kamēr dzīve brūk viņa acu priekšā. Ar sava labākā drauga palīdzību Tedijs cenšas izprast, kurā brīdī viņa dzīve nogāja no sliedēm, un, dzīvei zibot gar acīm, mēģina piepildīti izdzīvot tos retos mirkļus, kad var atgūt sievieti, kuru mīl.

programme.title: Morbiuss
programme.desc: Cenšoties atrast zāles savai retajai ģenētiskajai slimībai, bioķīmiķis Maikls Morbiuss nejauši inficējas ar vampīrisma vīrusu.

programme.title: Playmobil. Filma
programme.desc: Animācijas filmas radītājus iedvesmojušas Playmobil rotaļlietas.

programme.title: Krāpšanas ilūzija
programme.desc: Pagājis gads, kopš "Četriem jātniekiem" izdevās apvest ap stūri FIB. Viņi gaida ziņu no Acs – iluzionistu grupas, kura ir pieņēmusi viņus darbā. Daniels Atlass (Džese Aizenbergs) pats sāk savu izmeklēšanu, lai tos atrastu, kamēr nonāk līdz tehnoloģiju pavēlniekam Valteram Mebrijam (Daniels Redklifs), kurš "jātniekiem" uzdod nozagt datu iegūšanas ierīci. Pēc tam dzīve sagriežas virpulī, kurš ietekmē cilvēkus pagātnē, tagadnē un nākotnē.

programme.title: Bils un Teds nozog mūziku
programme.desc: Bils un Teds ir iestrēguši pusmūža problēmās. Abi ar sievām apmeklē pāru terapiju un nezaudē cerību īstenot mūziķu karjeru. Kādu dienu pie viņiem ierodas viešņa no nākotnes ar vēsti, ka tikai viņu radīta dziesma var glābt pasauli. Abi draugi dodas piedzīvojumā, lai beidzot piepildītu savu likteni. Ceļā viņiem palīdz meitas, dažādi vēsturiski tēli un vairākas mūzikas leģendas – kopīgi viņi meklē ideālo dziesmu, kas izglābs pasauli.

programme.title: Smurfi
programme.desc: Palicis ar garu degunu, burvis Gargamelis turpina kaldināt plānus, kā sagrābt savos nagos Smurfu burvju esenci. Šoreiz viņš ar burvestību palīdzību rada divus jaunus Smurfus, taču to vara izrādās nekam nederīga. Tādēļ viņš nolaupa Smurfeti un aizved viņu uz Parīzi. Taču Smurfu ģimene, protams, nepametīs Smurfeti nelaimē un dodas uz Parīzi viņu glābt. Talkā nāk arī viņu draugi cilvēki Patriks un Greisa.

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Dzīve
programme.desc: Šī ir filma par kādu parastu vīrieti, kuru gadiem ilgi nomākusī biroja rutīna novedusi līdz eksistencei ēnā. Tā dēļ viņš pēdējā brīdī pieliek vislielākās pūles, lai pārvērstu savu garlaicīgo dzīvi par kaut ko brīnišķīgu.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Lūsija
programme.desc: Seksapīlā blondīne Lūsija kļūst par bīstamāko un nāvējošāko sievieti uz pasaules, apveltītu ar nepārspējamu intelektu un pārcilvēciskām fiziskām spējām. No potenciāla upura viņa ir pārvērtusies par mednieci un dodas pa pēdām tiem, kuri viņu gribēja nogalināt.

programme.title: Robota bērns
programme.desc: Kādu pusaugu meiteni pazemes bunkurā gādīgi uzaudzina robots "Māte", kura uzdevums ir atjaunot cilvēku populāciju pēc cilvēces izmiršanas globālā katastrofā. Tomēr meitenes un robota īpašā saikne tiek apdraudēta, kad viņu patvērumā nez no kurienes ierodas svešiniece ar satraucošām ziņām.

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Kellijai un Mekam šķiet, ka viņi kopā ar jaundzimušo bērnu ir pārcēlušies uz klusu rajonu, taču tad kaimiņos ievācas studentu korporācijas puiši. Tedijs ir korporācijas prezidents, un Pīts ir viņa vietnieks. Puiši naski pieņem draudzības piedāvājumu, kad Kellija un Meks ierodas iepazīties. Tomēr drīz vien laulātajam pārim ir jāsauc talkā policija jauno kaimiņu savaldīšanai. Šī rīcība izraisa šausminošas sekas.

programme.title: Izbrauciens
programme.desc: Bens Bārbers (Kevins Hārts) gatavojas precēties ar saderināto Andželu (Tika Samptere), kura ir viņa policijas partnera Džeimsa (Aiss Kjūbs) māsa. Policistus nosūta uzdevumā uz Maiami, lai izmeklētu nežēlīgā narkotiku tirgoņa Antonio Poupa (Bendžamins Brats) nodarījumus, par kuru ir zināms, ka tas apgādā visu Maiami ar narkotikām. Viņi apvienojas ar bezkompromisu detektīvi Maju (Olīvija Manna) un dodas pārtraukt Poupa darbību. Spriedze palielinās, tuvojoties Bena un Andželas kāzām.

programme.title: Serie A. Napoli - Pisa
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Izslēgšanas spēles. 1/2 fināls. 1. spēle
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Hellas Verona - Juventus
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: NFL. Los Angeles Rams at Philadelphia Eagles
programme.desc: All the action of the National Football League 2020-2021.

programme.title: LaLiga. Espanyol - Valencia
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Barcelona - Getafe
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Home Town (Mothers Day Special
programme.desc: Ben and Erin want to surprise a friend by creating a nursery for her in only two weeks. Meanwhile, Ben plans a surprise of his own for Erin.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn take on a home in central Honolulu thats been abandoned for 20 years - and its their most challenging transformation yet.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn buy a house thats so termite-eaten, they dont even need a hammer for demo! More problems appear as they peel back the layers.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Things get off to a rocky start as Kamohai and Tristyn attempt their priciest flip to date. They need to add some serious square footage appeal.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian set out to makeover the existing castle playroom fit for the little princes and princesses who visit the castle.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer

He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: A familys basement renovation has been zero progress for over a year. Rico mediates between the contractor and family whilst remodelling their home.

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: A couples dream home was left to rot through two winters by their builder. Rico and his team aim to salvage what little is usable and turn the renovation around.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn tackle the renovation of a house in Kailua with an outdated 80s style, disgusting pool and a costly, failing retaining wall.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Home renovation expert Jennifer Todryk combines clever design and cost-saving ideas to create stunning home overhauls without any major demolition.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina restore a 1952 post-war home in Covina, CA. The house has a rich, industrial history but problems lurk around every corner.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Two flippers took on a property in Santa Clarita, but they desperately need help with the funky layout and unusual backyard "bomb shelter".

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Surfers by day and cat burglars by night, this trio of thieves is in New York to steal priceless jewels from the American Museum of Natural History. Their bold plan has them creeping along the museum ledge, 125 feet above the streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to Louisville to bet on a collection of vintage spirits, a pair of goggles signed by Kentucky Derby jockey Jon Court, and a vintage pedal car. Later, they visit the Louisville Slugger factory, for a home run of a surprise.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Nicola Tesla is the epitome of what some would call the "mad scientist" and also one of historys biggest inventors. When Tesla died, he allegedly had 80 trunks of papers full of ideas. But only 60 of those were found. Where are the other 20?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The gigantic statues of Easter Island have mystified humanity for centuries. How in the world did an ancient civilisation, with only primitive tools, carve and then move thousands of these rock monuments around the island… and why?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: Imagine a world where youre forced to obey every government order. That was once reality, with state-run mind control programs—from the CIAs truth serum hunt to U.S. Army PsyOps in Vietnam—revealing a history of alarming deception and manipulation.

programme.title: Holy Marvels with Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: For centuries, powerful artifacts have sparked wars, inspired legends, and shaped empires. From divine weapons, to formidable places, to sacred relics--these are the incredible stories of the worlds most mighty marvels.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Throughout human history, there have been sudden and dramatic leaps in our evolution that simply cannot be explained by Darwinian theory. Ancient Astronaut theorists propose that the "missing link" is extraterrestrial intervention.

Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: Imagine a world where youre forced to obey every government order. That was once reality, with state-run mind control programs—from the CIAs truth serum hunt to U.S. Army PsyOps in Vietnam—revealing a history of alarming deception and manipulation.

programme.title: Holy Marvels with Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: For centuries, powerful artifacts have sparked wars, inspired legends, and shaped empires. From divine weapons, to formidable places, to sacred relics--these are the incredible stories of the worlds most mighty marvels.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Throughout human history, there have been sudden and dramatic leaps in our evolution that simply cannot be explained by Darwinian theory. Ancient Astronaut theorists propose that the "missing link" is extraterrestrial intervention.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of... Molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar follows the exploits of treasure hunters Hamilton White and his long-time friend, Carl Cookson, as they search for the treasure hoard reputed to have belonged to the legendary Knights Templar. The mysterious Knights were the equivalent of todays special forces and were the most skilled fighters in the ranks of the Crusaders. However, up until the present day, no major item belonging to the Knights has ever been discovered. But Hamilton and Carl believe that they have now found a treasure trove that reveals who the Knights were, how they practised their beliefs, and why they were hunted, imprisoned and disbanded by Papal decree in 1307. Experts offer their analysis and opinion to clarify the history.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: We go beneath the streets of Japan to see the latest technology that saves the city from the many natural disasters ready to strike. Head back in time to World War II to see how Hiroshimas underground offered protection from the most powerful bombs.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Brad Meltzer enlists Americas help to find lost historical artifacts, which are going missing from museums and public collections at an alarming rate. Including historic moon tapes that hold the clearest footage from the Apollo 11 moon landing.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. programme.title: A Killer Among Friends

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. programme.title: American Monster

American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: Explore the true stories behind some of the most gruesome murder scenes discovered in Americas vast deserted swamplands. Follow in the footsteps of the leading detectives on each case as they get to work retracing the steps of the suspects and their victims. With dramatic recreations and exclusive interviews, each episode delves deep into the murky waters that cloud their investigations in the hopes of discovering what really happened and finally delivering justice to the victims and their families.

programme.title: The Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: After an innocent person is murdered, those closest to them, whether family members or friends, cant help but feel a surge of guilt entwined with their grief, as they reflect on whether they could have done more to prevent their death. The Shadows Of Death examines shocking murders from the perspective of the people struggling to find closure and move on. Whether their blame is from not acting on suspicious behaviour, or perhaps having some involvement, these individuals are struggling to cope with the lasting guilt weighing heavy on their conscience.

programme.title: Still A Mystery

programme.title: Still A Mystery

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.desc: In October 2022, 36-year-old Angie White is found dead at her home in Wales. Alexa recordings from the night of her murder help catch her killer.

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.desc: A bitter custody battle ends in tragedy when a toddler is found dead. A three-year manhunt ensues to track down her killer - her own mother.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Documentary series that tells true and often tragic stories of the crimes perpetrated on the internet and of deception and manipulation triggered by online interactions - from predators lurking behind Facebook profiles to maniacs searching for their victims in chat rooms. Series includes re-enactments, comments from law enforcement personnel, true-crime experts, psychologists and interviews from friends and families of the victims. Rare episodes feature victims who were extremely lucky to survive and are able to tell us what happened.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Chilling true-crime documentary series that explores the relationships that ended with fatal result. Series features archive footage, dramatic reconstructions and interviews with family, friends and law enforcement. From a suspicious carbon monoxide incident, a parrot who became an eyewitness to murder, to a spouse with a spiraling gambling addiction, and a motorcycle accident that is not what it seems, each episode will uncover the breaking point in each of these complex and toxic relationships and tell a tragic tale of what happens when love becomes lethal.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: ID Presents: Nine at
programme.desc: American true-crime documentary series investigating a number of mysterious deaths, events and individuals. Each episode peels back the layers on a different story, where disturbing details and concealed secrets slowly begin to emerge. From the tragic death of Hollywood star Brittany Murphy to the disappearance of a 20-year-old girl caught in a love triangle, or Rick Kirkhams view on "The Tiger King" Joe Exotic to the disconcerting death of Jeffrey Epstein, these events have shocked the nation, and Nine at 9 investigates the truth behind each tale.

programme.title: A Killer Among Friends
programme.desc: Best friends take a girls trip before applying to grad school. When one of them doesnt make it home, everyone wonders what happened in Vegas?

programme.title: Taken Together: Who Killed Lyric And Elizabeth?
programme.desc: The mysterious abduction of two young cousins in Iowa in July 2012 devastates two families. The mystery deepens when hunters find the girls bodies.

programme.title: Taken Together: Who Killed Lyric And Elizabeth?
programme.desc: Another double abduction nearby stuns the area and puts a local in the spotlight. Survivor Dezi Hughes speaks out about her terrifying experience.

programme.title: Taken Together: Who Killed Lyric And Elizabeth?
programme.desc: Dylan Sires continues to investigate the girls abduction. New details come to light, which leads Elizabeths father to confront a possible suspect.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A captivating documentary series exploring real-life murder cases, and as the evidence slowly unfolds, viewers are left guessing the identity of the killer. Each episode flashes forward to the engrossing courtroom proceedings, whilst in the meantime the mystery of the chilling murder is slowly being unravelled, and each new clue presents a possible new culprit. With each twist and turn, the truth begins to emerge, before a damning piece of new evidence or testimony flips the case on its head once more.
